channel.title: CVE Feed for Simopro Technology -- WinMatrix3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Simopro Technology -- WinMatrix3

item.title: CVE-2024-7201|2024-08-01T21:52:31.488Z -- simopro%20technology -- winmatrix3
item.description: The login functionality of WinMatrix3 Web package from Simopro Technology lacks proper validation of user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.

item.title: CVE-2024-7202|2024-08-01T21:52:31.217Z -- simopro%20technology -- winmatrix3
item.description: The query functionality of WinMatrix3 Web package from Simopro Technology lacks proper validation of user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.
